thread.title: New York police officer dies after being shot in head
thread.title_full: New York police officer dies after being shot in head | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: New York police officer dies after being shot in head
text:
A New York police officer reportedly has died after suffering a gunshot wound to the head.
According to The New York Times , the officer, 33-year-old Randolph Holder, was shot about 8:30 p.m. Tuesday after he responded to reports of an armed robbery in Harlem. A person of interest – a man who had been shot in the leg – was found five blocks away and taken into custody.
>> Read more trending stories
Dystopos via Flickr FILE PHOTO Police also found a bicycle and gun but did not say whether they were related to the incident, the Times reports .
“This whole city is in mourning,” Mayor Bill de Blasio said at a news conference.
Read more here.
